tool_description: Calculates price elasticity of demand by analyzing the relationship between price changes and demand/sales changes.

demand_data.description: Sales or demand data corresponding to price points

calculation_method.description: Elasticity calculation method: arc, point, regression

seasonal_adjustment.description: Whether to adjust for seasonal effects

error_messages: Insufficient data points: Need at least 10 price-demand pairs for reliable elasticity calculation.
Price-demand data mismatch: Price and demand arrays must have corresponding entries.
Invalid calculation method: Use arc, point, or regression.
Insufficient price variation: Need sufficient price changes to calculate meaningful elasticity.
usage: Provide historical price and demand data with timestamps. Specify calculation method and optional parameters for detailed elasticity analysis.

elasticity_interpretation.description: Interpretation of elasticity values (elastic, inelastic, etc.)

statistical_significance.description: Whether each elasticity coefficient is statistically significant

demand_sensitivity_summary.description: Overall summary of price sensitivity findings
